name: Aaron P. Sykes

accomplishments: Maintained and optimized the customer dashboard Python/Django modules responsible for collecting, aggregating, and enriching customer usage data
Designed, and developed HTTP/JSON APIs, and SQS queue workers for sending customer usage data to 3rd party cloud services
Created tooling for deploying and managing the Business System team's AWS infrastructure using CloudFormation and Ansible
Deprecated MongoDB, and migrated historical data to a PostgreSQL table with JSONB field
Oversaw Transition of customer audience data collection for billing to a single RPC over Protobuf source
Designed, developed, and maintained a multi-tenanted Python/Django  web app with JS/JQuery front-end
Engaged in group code reviews, and pair programming with a small team of developers
Utilized test-driven development methods by writing numerous automated unit and integration tests
Managed, and optimized a service stack running Nginx, uWSGI, and PostgreSQL in AWS
Designed and developed GAE web apps for displaying project health, and web traffic data using Python and JS
Implemented numerous Google Analytics and Google Tag Manager JS deployments
Reduced the time required to perform a weekly analysis of the business opportunity pipeline using an enterprise Database Management System
Facilitated the movement of medical records from servers at various Veteran Health Administration data hubs to a single data warehouse

additionalInfo: I've maintained a personal Linux desktop (currently ubuntu 18.04) for years. I use Git for nearly everything. I've had experience with: JSON, HTML5, CSS, XML, YAML.
